select count(*) from opening_applies where terminal_id = #{terminalId}

SELECT t.serial_num,g.model_number,b.name as brandName,c.name as channelName,c.`id` as appId FROM terminals t LEFT JOIN goods g on t.good_id=g.id LEFT JOIN good_brands b on g.good_brands_id=b.id LEFT JOIN pay_channels c on c.id=t.pay_channel_id WHERE t.id=#{terminalsId}
SELECT * FROM merchants WHERE title = #{merchantName} or phone = #{phone}

SELECT e.*,p.`name` as channelname,b.`name` as billingname FROM opening_applies e LEFT JOIN pay_channels p on p.id = e.pay_channel_id LEFT JOIN dictionary_billing_cycles b ON b.id = e.billing_cyde_id WHERE terminal_id = #{terminalId}
SELECT id,title FROM merchants WHERE customer_id = #{customerId} LIMIT #{offSetPage},#{pageSize}
SELECT count(*) FROM merchants WHERE customer_id = #{customerId}
SELECT d.id,d.`name` FROM pay_channels s LEFT JOIN pay_channel_billing_cycles p ON p.pay_channel_id = s.id LEFT JOIN dictionary_billing_cycles d ON d.id = p.billing_cycles_id WHERE s.id = #{id}

select dop.*, l.opening_requirements_id from dictionary_open_private_infos dop LEFT JOIN opening_requirement_lists l on dop.id=l.requirement_setting_id LEFT JOIN opening_requirements o ON o.id = l.opening_requirements_id left join terminals t on t.pay_channel_id = o.pay_channel_id where t.id=#{terminalsId} AND l.requirement_type=#{status} order by l.opening_requirements_id
SELECT id FROM opening_applies WHERE terminal_id=#{id}
